| ------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 034:046 | Say: "I advise you to do one thing: that you stand to God, in pairs or as individuals, then reflect. There is no madness in your friend, he is only a warner to you in the face of a severe retribution." |||
| 034:047 | Say: "I have not asked you for any wage; you can keep it. My wage is from God, and He is witness over all things."                                                                                        |||
| 034:048 | Say: "My Lord rebuts with the truth. He is the Knower of all secrets."                                                                                                                                    |||
| 034:049 | Say: "The truth has come; while falsehood can neither initiate anything, nor resurrect."                                                                                                                  |||
| 034:050 | Say: "If I stray, then I stray to my own loss. And if I am guided, then it is because of what my Lord inspired to me. He is Hearer, Near."                                                                |||
| 034:051 | And if you could but see, when they will be terrified with no escape, and they will be taken from a place that is near.                                                                                   |||
| 034:052 | And they will Say: "We believe in it," but it will be far too late.                                                                                                                                       |||
| 034:053 | And they had rejected it in the past; and they conjectured about the unseen from a place far off.                                                                                                         |||
| 034:054 | And they will be separated from what they had desired, as was done for their counterparts before. They have been in grave doubt.                                                                          |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |||
| ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |||
|         | In the name of God, the Almighty, the Most Merciful.                                                                                                                                                               |||
| 035:001 | Praise be to God, Initiator of the heavens and the Earth; maker of the Angels as messengers with wings in two's, and three's, and four's. He increases in the creation as He wishes. God is able to do all things. |||
| 035:002 | Whatever mercy God opens for the people, none can stop it. And what He holds back none can send it other than He. And He is the Noble, the Wise.                                                                   |||
| 035:003 | O people, remember God's blessing upon you. Is there any creator other than God who provides for you from the heaven and the Earth? There is no god besides Him, so why do you deviate?                            |||
| 035:004 | And if they deny you, then also messengers before you have been denied. And to God will all matters be returned.                                                                                                   |||
| 035:005 | O people, God's promise is the truth; therefore, do not be overwhelmed by this worldly life, and do not let arrogance overwhelm you from God.                                                                      |||
| 035:006 | The devil is an enemy to you, so treat him as an enemy. He only invites his faction to be the dwellers of Hell.                                                                                                    |||
| 035:007 | Those who reject will have a painful retribution, and those who believe and do good works they will have a forgiveness and a great reward.                                                                         |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |||
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 035:008 | The one whose evil work is adorned and he sees it as being good. God thus misguides whom he wills, and He guides whom He wills. So do not let yourself grieve over them. God is fully aware of what they are doing.                                                                                   |||
| 035:009 | And God is the One who sends the winds so it stirs up a cloud, then We drive it to a town that is dead, and We revive with it the land after it had died. Such is the resurrection.                                                                                                                   |||
| 035:010 | Whosoever is seeking pride, then know that to God belongs all Pride. To Him ascend the good words, and they are exalted by the good deeds. And as for those who scheme evil, they will have a painful retribution, and their scheming will fail.                                                      |||
| 035:011 | And God created you from dust, then from a seed, then He made you into pairs. And no female becomes pregnant, nor gives birth, without His knowledge. Nor does anyone have his life extended, or his life is shortened, except in a record. This is easy for God.                                     |||
| 035:012 | Nor are the two seas the same. One is fresh and palatable, good to drink, while the other is salty and bitter. And from each of them you eat tender meat, and you extract jewellery to wear. And you see the ships sailing through them, seeking His provisions; and perhaps you may be appreciative. |||
| 035:013 | He merges the night into the day, and merges the day into the night. And He has committed the sun and the moon, each runs for a predetermined period. Such is God your Lord; to Him is the sovereignty. And as for those whom you call on besides Him, they do not possess a seed's shell.            |||
| 035:014 | If you call on them, they cannot hear you. And even if they hear you, they cannot respond to you. And on the Day of Resurrection, they will reject your idolatry. And none can inform you like an Expert.                                                                                             |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |||
| ------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 035:015 | O people, you are the poor when it comes to God, while God is the Rich, the Praiseworthy.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |||
| 035:016 | If He wishes, He could do away with you and He would bring a new creation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |||
| 035:017 | And this is not too difficult for God.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |||
| 035:018 | And none can carry the load of another, and even if it calls on another to bear part of its load, no other can carry any part of it, even if they were related. You will only be able to warn those who fear their Lord while unseen, and they hold the contact-method. And whoever contributes, is contributing for himself. And to God is the final destiny. |||
| 035:019 | The blind and the seer are not equal.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |||
| 035:020 | Nor are the darkness and the light.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| 035:021 | Nor are the shade and the heat.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |||
| 035:022 | Nor equal are the living and the dead; God causes whomever He wills to hear. And you cannot make those who are in the graves hear.                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| 035:023 | You are but a warner.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |||
| 035:024 | We have sent you with the truth, a bearer of good news, and a warner. There is not a nation but a warner came to it.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |||
| 035:025 | And if they deny you, then those before them have also denied. Their messengers went to them with proofs, and the Psalms, and the enlightening Scripture.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |||
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 035:027 | Do you not see that God sends down water from the sky, thus We produce with it fruits of various colors? And of the mountains are peaks that are white, red, or some other color and intense black.                                                                                             |||
| 035:028 | And from the people, and the animals, and the livestock, are various colors. As such, only the knowledgeable among God's servants reverence Him. God is Noble, Forgiving.                                                                                                                       |||
| 035:029 | Surely, those who recite God's Scripture, and hold the contact-method, and spend secretly and openly from what We have provided them, they are seeking a trade that can never lose.                                                                                                             |||
| 035:030 | He will give them their recompense, and He will increase them from His blessings. He is Forgiving, Appreciative.                                                                                                                                                                                |||
| 035:031 | And what We inspired to you from the Scripture, it is the truth, authenticating what is present. God is Expert of His servants, Seer.                                                                                                                                                           |||
| 035:032 | Then We inherited the Scripture to those whom We selected from Our servants. Subsequently, some of them wronged their souls, and others upheld it partly, while others were eager to work righteousness in accordance with God's will; this is the greatest triumph.                            |||

| 035:034 | And they will Say: "Praise be to God who took away our sorrow. Our Lord is Forgiving, Appreciative."                                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| 035:035 | "The One who admitted us into the abode of eternal bliss, out of His grace. In it, no boredom touches us, nor does any fatigue."                                                                                                                                                                |||

It is such that We requite every rejecter.                                                                                                     |||

| ------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 035:038 | God knows unseen of the heavens and the Earth. He is knowledgeable of what is even inside the chests.                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |||

The disbelief of the disbelievers only increases their loss.                                               |||

Or have We given them a scripture wherein they are taking knowledge from it? Indeed, what the transgressors promise one another is no more than arrogance." |||

He is Compassionate, Forgiving.                                                                                                                          |||

You will not find any change in God's way, and you will not find any bypass to His way.                                           |||

Then, when their time comes, then God is Seer of His servants.                                                                                                  |||

|         | In the name of God, the Almighty, the Most Merciful.                                                                                               |||
| 036:001 | Y. S.                                                                                                                                              |||
| 036:002 | And the Quran of wisdom.                                                                                                                           |||
| 036:003 | You are one of the messengers.                                                                                                                     |||
| 036:004 | Upon [a straight path](/w/index.php?title=Quran_as-Sirat_al-Mustaqeem&action=edit&redlink=1 "Quran as-Sirat al-Mustaqeem (page does not exist)").  |||
| 036:005 | The revelation of the Most Honourable, Most Merciful.                                                                                              |||
| 036:006 | To warn a people whose fathers were not warned, for they are unaware.                                                                              |||

| 036:008 | We have placed shackles around their necks, up to their chins, so that they are forced in direction.                                               |||
| 036:009 | And We have placed a barrier in front of them, and a barrier behind them, thus We shielded them so they cannot see.                                |||
| 036:010 | And whether you warn them or do not warn them, they will not believe.                                                                              |||
| 036:011 | You can only warn him who follows the reminder, and reverences the Almighty while unseen. Give him good news of forgiveness and a generous reward. |||

| ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||

| 036:015 | They replied: "You are but human beings like us, and the Almighty did not send down anything, you are only telling lies."                                  |||
| 036:016 | They said: "Our Lord knows that we have been sent to you."                                                                                                 |||
| 036:017 | "And we are only required to give a clear delivery."                                                                                                       |||
| 036:018 | They replied: "We have welcomed you better than you deserve. If you do not cease, we will stone you, and you will receive a painful retribution from us\!" |||
| 036:019 | They said: "Keep your welcome with you, for you have been reminded. Indeed, you are transgressing people."                                                 |||

| 036:021 | "Follow those who do not ask you for any wage, and are guided."                                                                                            |||
| 036:022 | "And why should I not serve the One who initiated me, and to Him is your ultimate return?"                                                                 |||
| 036:023 | "Shall I take gods besides Him? If the Almighty intends any harm for me, their intercession cannot help me in the least, nor can they save me."            |||
| 036:024 | "Then I would be clearly astray."                                                                                                                          |||
| 036:025 | "I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me\!"                                                                                                          |||
| 036:026 | It was said: "Enter Paradise." He said "Oh, how I wish my people only knew\!"                                                                              |||
| 036:027 | "Of what my Lord has forgiven me, and made me of the honoured ones."                                                                                       |||
| 036:028 | And We did not send down upon his people after him soldiers from the sky; for there was no need to send them down.                                         |||
| 036:029 | For all it took was one scream, whereupon they were stilled.                                                                                               |||

| 036:031 | Did they not see how many generations We destroyed before them, do they not go back to them?                                                               |||

| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||

| 036:036 | Praise be to the One who created all pairs from what the Earth sprouts out and from themselves, and from what they do not know.                                                                       |||

| 036:039 | And the moon We have measured it to appear in stages, until it returns to being like an old curved sheath.                                                                                            |||
| 036:040 | The sun is not required to overtake the moon, nor will the night precede the day; each of them is swimming in its own orbit.                                                                          |||
| 036:041 | And a sign for them is that We carried their ancestors on the charged Ship.                                                                                                                           |||
| 036:042 | And We created for them of its similarity, to ride in.                                                                                                                                                |||
| 036:043 | And if We wished, We could drown them, so that their screaming would not be heard, nor could they be saved.                                                                                           |||
| 036:044 | Except through a mercy from Us, and as an enjoyment for awhile.                                                                                                                                       |||
| 036:045 | And when they are told: "Be aware of your present and your past, that you may attain mercy."                                                                                                          |||

| 036:047 | And when they are told: "Spend from what God has provisioned you." Those who reject say to those who believe: "Shall we feed those whom God could feed, if He so willed? You are clearly misguided\!" |||

| 036:049 | They will not realize it when one scream overwhelms them, while they dispute.                                                                                                                         |||
| 036:050 | They will not even be able to leave a will, nor will they be able to return to their people.                                                                                                          |||

| 036:060 | "Did I not pledge to you, O Children of Adam, that you should not serve the devil for he is your most ardent enemy?"                                                                 |||

| 041:012 | Thus, He then made them into seven universes in two days, and He inspired to every universe its affair. And We adorned the lowest universe with lamps, and for protection. Such is the design of the Noble, the Knowledgeable.               |||
| 041:013 | But if they turn away, then Say: "I have warned you of a destruction like the destruction of 'Aad and Thamud."                                                                                                                               |||
| 041:014 | When the messengers came to them, publicly and privately: "You shall not serve except God." They said: "Had our Lord willed, He would have sent Angels. We are rejecting what you have been sent with."                                      |||
| 041:015 | As for 'Aad, they turned arrogant on Earth, without any right, and they said: "Who is mightier than us in strength?" Did they not see that God, who created them, was mightier than they in strength? And they were denying Our revelations. |||
| 041:016 | Consequently, We sent upon them violent wind, for a few miserable day, that We may let them taste the humiliating retribution in this life, and the retribution of the Hereafter is more humiliating; they can never win.                    |||
| 041:017 | And as for Thamud, We provided them with guidance, but they preferred blindness over guidance. Consequently, the blast of humiliating retribution annihilated them, because of what they earned.                                             |||
| 041:018 | And We saved those who believed and were righteous.                                                                                                                                                                                          |||

| 041:019 | And the Day when the enemies of God will be gathered to the Fire, forcibly.                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 041:020 | When they come to it, their own hearing, eyes, and skins will bear witness to everything they had done.                                                                                                                           |||
| 041:021 | And they will say to their skins: "Why did you bear witness against us?" They will reply: "God made us speak; He is the One who causes everything to speak. He is the One who created you the first time, and to Him you return." |||
| 041:022 | And there was no way you could hide from the testimony of your own hearing, or your eyes, or your skins. In fact, you thought that God was unaware of much of what you do.                                                        |||
| 041:023 | And this is the kind of thinking about your Lord that has caused you to fail, and thus you became of the losers.                                                                                                                  |||
| 041:024 | If they wait, then the Fire will be their destiny, and if they beg to be excused, they will not be excused.                                                                                                                       |||
| 041:025 | And We assigned to them companions who adorned their present and past actions. Thus, the retribution has been deserved by them the same as previous nations of Jinn and humans; all of them were losers.                          |||

| ------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 041:026 | And those who rejected said: "Do not listen to this Quran and talk over it that you may succeed."                                                                                                                     |||

| ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||

| 041:046 | Whoever does good works does so for his own soul, and whoever works evil shall have the same. Your Lord does not wrong the servants.                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| 041:047 | To Him belongs the knowledge regarding the Hour. And no fruits emerge from their sheaths, nor does any female conceive or give birth, except by His knowledge. | 041:048 | And they were abandoned by that which they used to call on before, and they realised that there will be no escape.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |||
| 041:049 | The human being does not tire in imploring for good things. But if adversity touches him, he is disheartened, desperate\!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |||

| 042:003 | Similarly, inspiring you and those before you, is God, the Noble, the Wise.                                                                                                                                             |||

| 042:005 | The heavens would nearly shatter from above them, and the Angels praise the glory of their Lord, and they ask forgiveness for those on Earth. Surely, God is the Forgiver, the Merciful.                                |||
| 042:006 | And those who take allies besides Him, God is responsible for them; and you are not a guardian over them.                                                                                                               |||
| 042:007 | And thus We have inspired to you an Arabic Quran, so that you may warn the capital town and all around it, and to warn about the Day of Gathering that is inevitable. A group will be in Paradise, and a group in Hell. |||

He is the Hearer, the Seer.                                                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| 042:012 | To Him belongs the possessions of the heavens and the Earth. He spreads out the provision for whomever He wills, and He measures it. God chooses to Himself whomever He wills; He guides to Himself those who repent.                                               |||

| 042:024 | Or do they Say: "He has fabricated lies about God\!" If God willed, He could have sealed your heart. And God erases the falsehood and affirms the truth with His words. He is fully aware of what is inside the chests.                                                                   |||

| 043:061 | And he was a lesson for the Hour. So have no doubt about it. And follow Me; this is [a straight path](/w/index.php?title=Quran_as-Sirat_al-Mustaqeem&action=edit&redlink=1 "Quran as-Sirat al-Mustaqeem (page does not exist)"). |||
| 043:062 | And let not the devil repel you; he is to you a clear enemy.                                                                                                                                                                     |||
| 043:063 | And when Jesus came with the proofs, he said: "I have come to you with the wisdom, and to clarify some of the matters in which you dispute. So be aware of God and obey me."                                                     |||
| 043:064 | "God is my Lord and your Lord. So serve Him. This is a straight path."                                                                                                                                                           |||
| 043:065 | The groups disputed among themselves. Woe to those who have been wicked from the retribution of a painful Day.                                                                                                                   |||
| 043:066 | Do they only wait for the Hour to come to them suddenly, while they do not perceive?                                                                                                                                             |||
| 043:067 | Friends on that Day will become enemies of one another, except for the righteous.                                                                                                                                                |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 043:068 | "O My servants, you will have no fear on this Day, nor will you grieve."                                                                                                                    |||
| 043:069 | They are the ones who believed in Our revelations, and had surrendered.                                                                                                                     |||
| 043:070 | "Enter Paradise, together with your spouses, in happiness."                                                                                                                                 |||
| 043:071 | They will be served with golden trays and cups, and they will find everything the self desires and the eyes wish for, and you will abide therein forever.                                   |||
| 043:072 | And this is the Paradise that you have inherited, in return for your works.                                                                                                                 |||
| 043:073 | In it you will have all kinds of fruits, from which you eat.                                                                                                                                |||
| 043:074 | Surely, the criminals will abide in the retribution of Hell forever.                                                                                                                        |||
| 043:075 | It will not be removed from them; they will be confined therein.                                                                                                                            |||
| 043:076 | And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.                                                                                                                         |||
| 043:077 | And they called out: "O Malek, please let your Lord terminate us\!" He will Say: "No, you are remaining."                                                                                   |||
| 043:078 | We have come to you with the truth, but most of you hate the truth.                                                                                                                         |||
| 043:079 | Or have they devised some scheme? We will also devise.                                                                                                                                      |||
| 043:080 | Or do they think that We do not hear their secrets and private counsel? Yes indeed; and Our messengers are with them, recording.                                                            |||
| 043:081 | Say: "If the Almighty had a son, I would be the first to serve\!"                                                                                                                           |||
| 043:082 | Glorified be the Lord of the heavens and the Earth, the Lord of the Throne, from what they describe.                                                                                        |||
| 043:083 | So leave them to speak nonsense and play until they meet their Day, which they have been promised.                                                                                          |||
| 043:084 | And He is the One who is a god in the heaven and a god on Earth. And He is the Wise, the Knowledgeable.                                                                                     |||
| 043:085 | And blessed is the One who possesses the sovereignty of the heavens and the Earth, and everything between them; and with Him is the knowledge of the Hour, and to Him you will be returned. |||
| 043:086 | And those whom they call on beside Him do not possess any intercession; except those who bear witness to the truth, and they fully know.                                                    |||
| 043:087 | And if you asked them who created them, they would say, "God." Why then do they deviate?                                                                                                    |||
| 043:088 | And it will be said: "O my Lord, these are a people who do not believe."                                                                                                                    |||
| 043:089 | So disregard them and Say: "Peace." For they will come to know.                                                                                                                             |||

|         |                                                                                                       |||
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
|         | In the name of God, the Almighty, the Most Merciful.                                                  |||
| 044:001 | H. M.                                                                                                 |||
| 044:002 | And the clarifying Scripture.                                                                         |||
| 044:003 | We have sent it down in a blessed night. Surely, We were to warn.                                     |||
| 044:004 | In it, is a decree for every matter of wisdom.                                                        |||
| 044:005 | A decree from Us. Surely, We were to send messengers.                                                 |||
| 044:006 | A mercy from your Lord. He is the Hearer, the Knowledgeable.                                          |||
| 044:007 | The Lord of the heavens and the Earth, and everything between them. If you were certain\!             |||
| 044:008 | There is no god except Him. He gives life and causes death; your Lord and the Lord of your ancestors. |||
| 044:009 | No; they are in doubt, playing.                                                                       |||
| 044:010 | Therefore, watch for the day when the sky will bring a visible smoke.                                 |||
| 044:011 | It will envelop the people: "This is a painful retribution\!"                                         |||
| 044:012 | "Our Lord, remove the retribution from us; we are believers."                                         |||
| 044:013 | How is it that now they remember, while a clarifying messenger had come to them?                      |||
| 044:014 | But they turned away from him and said: "Clearly educated, but crazy\!"                               |||
| 044:015 | We will remove the retribution in a while; you will then revert back.                                 |||
| 044:016 | On the Day We strike the great strike, We will avenge.                                                |||
| 044:017 | And We had tested before them the people of Pharaoh, and an honourable messenger came to them.        |||
| 044:018 | "Restore to me the servants of God. I am a trustworthy messenger to you."                             |||
| 044:019 | "And, do not transgress against God. I come to you with clear authority."                             |||
| 044:020 | "And I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord, should you stone me."                                    |||
| 044:021 | "And if you do not wish to believe, then leave me alone."                                             |||
| 044:022 | Subsequently, he called on his Lord: "These are a criminal people."                                   |||
| 044:023 | You shall travel with My servants during the night; you will be pursued.                              |||
| 044:024 | And cross the sea quickly; their troops will be drowned.                                              |||
| 044:025 | How many paradises and springs did they leave behind?                                                 |||
| 044:026 | And crops and luxurious dwellings?                                                                    |||
| 044:027 | And blessings that they enjoyed?                                                                      |||
| 044:028 | Thus it was\!; and We caused another people to inherit it.                                            |||
| 044:029 | Neither the heaven, nor the Earth wept over them, and they were not respited.                         |||

|         |                                                                                                         |||
| ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 044:030 | And We saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating agony.                                         |||
| 044:031 | From Pharaoh; he was a transgressing tyrant.                                                            |||
| 044:032 | And We have chosen them, out of knowledge, over the worlds.                                             |||
| 044:033 | And We granted them signs, which constituted a great test.                                              |||
| 044:034 | These people now are saying:                                                                            |||
| 044:035 | "There is nothing but our first death; and we will never be resurrected\!"                              |||
| 044:036 | "So bring back our forefathers, if you are truthful\!"                                                  |||
| 044:037 | Are they better or the people of Tubba\` and those before them? We destroyed them, they were criminals. |||
| 044:038 | And We have not created the heavens and the Earth, and everything between them, for mere play.          |||
| 044:039 | We did not create them except with the truth, but most of them do not know.                             |||
| 044:040 | Surely, the Day of Separation is the appointment for them all.                                          |||
| 044:041 | That is the Day when no friend can help his friend in any way; nor will they be helped.                 |||
| 044:042 | Except him on whom God has mercy. He is the Noble, the Merciful.                                        |||

|         |                                                                                                             |||
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 044:043 | Surely, the tree of Bitterness.                                                                             |||
| 044:044 | Will be the food for the sinful.                                                                            |||
| 044:045 | Like hot oil, it will boil in the stomachs.                                                                 |||
| 044:046 | Like the boiling of liquid.                                                                                 |||
| 044:047 | "Take him and throw him into the midst of Hell."                                                            |||
| 044:048 | "Then pour upon his head the retribution of boiling liquid."                                                |||
| 044:049 | "Taste this; surely you are the noble, the generous\!"                                                      |||
| 044:050 | Surely, this is what you used to doubt\!                                                                    |||
| 044:051 | The righteous will be in a place of security.                                                               |||
| 044:052 | Among paradises and springs.                                                                                |||
| 044:053 | Wearing silk and satin; facing each other.                                                                  |||
| 044:054 | So it is, and We coupled them with wonderful companions.                                                    |||
| 044:055 | They enjoy in it all kinds of fruits, in perfect peace.                                                     |||
| 044:056 | They do not taste death therein except for the first death, and He has spared them the retribution of Hell. |||
| 044:057 | As a blessing from your Lord. Such is the great triumph.                                                    |||
| 044:058 | We have thus made it easy in your language, perhaps they may take heed.                                     |||
| 044:059 | Therefore, keep watch; for they too will keep watch.                                                        |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
|         | In the name of God, the Almighty, the Most Merciful.                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 045:001 | H. M.                                                                                                                                                                                                      |||
| 045:002 | The revelation of the Scripture is from God, the Noble, the Wise.                                                                                                                                          |||
| 045:003 | In the heavens and the Earth are signs for the believers.                                                                                                                                                  |||
| 045:004 | And in your creation, and what creatures He puts forth are signs for people who are certain.                                                                                                               |||
| 045:005 | And the alternation of the night and the day, and what God sends down from the sky of provisions to revive the land after its death, and the changing of the winds; are signs for a people who understand. |||
| 045:006 | These are God's revelations that We recite to you with truth. So, in which narration, after God and His revelations, do they believe?                                                                      |||
| 045:007 | Woe to every sinful fabricator.                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| 045:008 | He hears God's revelations being recited to him, then he persists arrogantly, as if he never heard them. Give him news of a painful retribution.                                                           |||
| 045:009 | And if he learns anything from Our revelations, he makes fun of them. For these will be a humiliating retribution.                                                                                         |||
| 045:010 | Waiting for them is Hell. And that which they earned will not help them, nor those whom they have taken as allies besides God, and for them is a terrible retribution.                                     |||
| 045:011 | This is a guidance. And those who reject the revelations of their Lord, for them is an affliction of a painful retribution.                                                                                |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 045:012 | God is the One who committed the sea in your service, so that the ships can sail in it by His command, and that you may seek of His provisions, and that you may be appreciative.                                                           |||
| 045:013 | And He committed in your service all that is in the heavens and in the Earth; all from Him. In that are signs for a people who reflect.                                                                                                     |||
| 045:014 | Say to those who believed to forgive those who do not look forward to the days of God. He will fully recompense people for whatever they have earned.                                                                                       |||
| 045:015 | Whoever works good does so for himself, and whoever works evil will suffer it. Then to your Lord you will be returned.                                                                                                                      |||
| 045:016 | And We had given the Children of Israel the Scripture, and the judgment, and the prophethood, and We provided them with good provisions; and We preferred them over the worlds.                                                             |||
| 045:017 | And We gave them clarity in the matter, but then they disputed after the knowledge had come to them, out of jealousy amongst themselves. Your Lord will judge them on the Day of Resurrection regarding everything that they have disputed. |||
| 045:018 | Then We have established you on the correct path; so follow it and do not follow the desires of those who do not know.                                                                                                                      |||
| 045:019 | They cannot help you against God in the least. And the transgressors are allies to one another, while God is the Protector of the righteous.                                                                                                |||
| 045:020 | This is a physical evidence for the people, and a guidance and a mercy for a people who are certain.                                                                                                                                        |||
| 045:021 | Or do those who work evil expect that We would treat them the same as those who believe and do good works, in their present life and their death? Miserable is how they judge.                                                              |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |||
| ------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 045:022 | And God created the heavens and the Earth with truth, and so that every soul may be recompensed for whatever it earned, and they will not be wronged.                                                                               |||
| 045:023 | Have you seen the one who took his ego as his god, and God led him astray, despite his knowledge, and He sealed his hearing and his heart, and He made a veil on his eyes? Who then can guide him after God? Will you not remember? |||
| 045:024 | And they said: "There is nothing but this worldly life; we die and we live and nothing destroys us except the passing of time\!" And they have no knowledge about this; they only conjecture.                                       |||
| 045:025 | And when Our clear revelations are recited to them, their only argument is to Say: "Then bring back our forefathers, if you are truthful."                                                                                          |||
| 045:026 | Say: "God gives you life, then He puts you to death, then He will gather you to the Day of Resurrection, in which there is no doubt. But most people do not know."                                                                  |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |||
| ------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 045:027 | And to God is the sovereignty of the heavens and the Earth. And on the Day the Hour comes to pass, on that Day the falsifiers will lose.                                                                             |||
| 045:028 | And you will see every nation lined-up together. Every nation will be called to its record. "Today, you be recompensed for everything you have done."                                                                |||
| 045:029 | "This is Our record; it utters the truth about you. We have been recording everything you did."                                                                                                                      |||
| 045:030 | As for those who believe and did good works, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. Such is the clear triumph.                                                                                                   |||
| 045:031 | As for those who disbelieve: "Were not My revelations recited to you, but you turned arrogant and were a criminal people?"                                                                                           |||
| 045:032 | And when it was said: "Surely God's promise is the truth, and there is no doubt about the coming of the Hour," you said: "We do not know what the Hour is\! We are full of conjecture about it; we are not certain." |||
| 045:033 | And the evils of their works will become evident to them, and the very thing they ridiculed will be their doom.                                                                                                      |||
| 045:034 | And it will be said to them: "Today We will forget you, just as you forgot the meeting of this Day. And your abode is the Fire, and you will have no helpers."                                                       |||
| 045:035 | "This is because you took God's revelations in mockery, and you were deceived by the worldly life." So from this Day, they will never exit therefrom, nor will they be excused.                                      |||
| 045:036 | To God belongs all praise; the Lord of the heavens, and the Lord of the Earth; the Lord of the worlds.                                                                                                               |||
| 045:037 | And to Him belongs all majesty in the heavens and the Earth. He is the Noble, the Wise.                                                                                                                              |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |||
|         | In the name of God, the Almighty, the Most Merciful.                                                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 046:001 | H. M.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |||
| 046:002 | The revelation of the Scripture from God, the Noble, the Wise.                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| 046:003 | We did not create the heavens and the Earth, and everything between them except with truth, and for an appointed time. And those who disbelieve turn away from what they are being warned with.                                            |||
| 046:004 | Say: "Do you see those that you call on besides God? Show me what they have created on the Earth, or do they have a share in the heavens? Bring me a scripture before this, or any trace of knowledge, if you are truthful."               |||
| 046:005 | And who is more astray than one who calls on others besides God that do not respond to him even till the Day of Resurrection? And they are totally unaware of the calls to them\!                                                          |||
| 046:006 | And at the time when mankind is gathered, they will be enemies for them, and they will reject their worship.                                                                                                                               |||
| 046:007 | And when Our clear revelations are recited to them, those who rejected said of the truth that came to them: "This is evidently magic\!"                                                                                                    |||
| 046:008 | Or do they Say: "He fabricated this\!" Say: "If I fabricated this, then you cannot protect me at all from God. He is fully aware of what you say. He suffices as a witness between me and you. He is the Forgiver, the Merciful."          |||
| 046:009 | Say: "I am no different from the other messengers, nor do I know what will happen to me or to you. I only follow what is inspired to me. I am no more than a clear warner"                                                                 |||
| 046:010 | Say: "Do you see that if it were from God, and you rejected it, and a witness from the Children of Israel testified to its similarity, and he has believed, while you have turned arrogant? Surely, God does not guide the wicked people." |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| ------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 046:011 | And those who had rejected said regarding those who had believed: "If it were any good, they would not have beaten us to it." And when they are not able to be guided by it, they will Say: "This is an old fabrication\!"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |||
| 046:012 | And before this was the Scripture of Moses, as a role model and a mercy. And this is an authenticating Scripture, in an Arabic tongue, to warn those who transgressed, and to give good news to the righteous.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| 046:013 | Surely, those who said: "Our Lord is God," then they lead a righteous life, there is no fear for them, nor will they grieve.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |||
| 046:014 | These are the dwellers of Paradise, abiding therein, a reward for what they used to do.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |||
| 046:015 | And We enjoined the human being to honour his parents. His mother bore him with hardship, gave birth to him in hardship, and his weaning lasts thirty months. Until he has attained his maturity, and reaches forty years, he says: "My Lord, direct me to appreciate the blessings You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents, and to do righteousness that pleases You. And let my progeny be righteous. I have repented to You; I am of those who have surrendered." |||
| 046:016 | It is from these that We accept the best of their deeds, and We shall overlook their sins, among the dwellers of Paradise. This is the promise of truth that they had been promised.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 046:017 | And the one who says to his parents: "Enough of you\! Are you promising me that I will be resurrected, when the generations who died before me never came back?" While they both will implore God: "Woe to you; believe\! For God's promise is the truth." He would Say: "This is nothing but tales from the past\!"                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 046:018 | These are the ones against whom the retribution has been deserved in nations who had come before them of humans and Jinn; they are the losers.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| 046:019 | And to each will be degrees according to what they did, and He will recompense them and they will not be wronged.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |||
| 046:020 | And on the Day when those who disbelieved will be displayed to the Fire: "You have wasted the good things given to you during your worldly life, and you took pleasure in it. Consequently, today you will be recompensed with a shameful retribution for your arrogance in the land without any right, and for your evil works."                                                                                                                                          |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |||
| ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 046:021 | And recall that the brother of \`Aad warned his people at the dunes, while numerous warnings were also delivered before him and with him: "You shall not serve except God. For I fear for you the retribution of a great day."                                                                                               |||
| 046:022 | They said: "Have you come to us to divert us away from our gods? Then bring us what you are promising us, if you are truthful\!"                                                                                                                                                                                             |||
| 046:023 | He said: "The knowledge of it is with God; and I only convey to you what I was sent with. However, I see that you are a people who are ignorant."                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| 046:024 | Then when they saw the dense cloud heading towards their valley, they said: "This is a dense cloud that will bring to us much needed rain\!" No, this is what you had asked to be hastened; a violent wind wherein there is painful retribution.                                                                             |||
| 046:025 | It destroys everything by the commanded of its Lord. Thus they became such that nothing could be seen except their homes. We thus requite the criminal people.                                                                                                                                                               |||
| 046:026 | And We had established them in the same way as We established you, and provided them with the hearing, and the eyesight, and the heart. But their hearing, eyesight, and hearts did not help them at all. This is because they used to disregard God's revelations, and they were stricken by that which they used to mock\! |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |||
| ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 046:027 | And We have destroyed the towns around you, after We had explained the proofs, perhaps they would repent.                                                                                                                                                                                                           |||
| 046:028 | Why then did the idols they set up to bring them closer to God fail to help them? Instead, they abandoned them. Such was their lie, and what they fabricated.                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 046:029 | And We sent to you a small number of Jinn, in order to let them listen to the Quran. So when they arrived there, they said: "Pay attention." Then, when it was finished, they returned to their people, to warn them.                                                                                               |||
| 046:030 | They said: "O our people, we have heard a Scripture that was sent down after Moses, authenticating what is present with him. It guides to the truth; and to a Straight Path."                                                                                                                                       |||
| 046:031 | "O our people, respond to God's caller, and believe in Him. He will then forgive your sins, and spare you a painful retribution."                                                                                                                                                                                   |||
| 046:032 | And whosoever does not respond to God's caller, then he cannot escape on the Earth, and he will not have besides Him any allies. These are the ones who have gone far astray.                                                                                                                                       |||
| 046:033 | Did they not see that God, Who created the heavens and the Earth, and was not tired by their creation, is able to revive the dead? Yes indeed; He is able to do all things.                                                                                                                                         |||
| 046:034 | And the Day the disbelievers are displayed to the Fire: "Is this not the truth?" They will answer: "Yes indeed, by our Lord." He will say, "Then taste the retribution for what you had rejected."                                                                                                                  |||
| 046:035 | Therefore, be patient like the messengers of strong-will did before you and do not be in haste regarding them. On the Day they will see what they have been promised, it will be as if they had not remained except for one hour of a single day. A proclamation: "Are any destroyed except for the wicked people?" |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |||
| ------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
|         | In the name of God, the Almighty, the Most Merciful.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |||
| 047:001 | Those who rejected and repelled from the path of God, He will mislead their works.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 047:002 | And those who believe and do good works, and believe in what was sent down to Mohammed, for it is the truth from their Lord, He cancels for them their sins, and relieves their concern.                                                                                                                                                                                                 |||
| 047:003 | That is because those who disbelieve followed falsehood, while those who believe followed the truth from their Lord. God thus cites for the people their examples.                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 047:004 | So, if you encounter those who have rejected, then strike their formations until you overcome them, then bind them securely. You may either set them free or ransom them, until the war ends. And had God willed, He alone could have beaten them, but He thus tests you by one another. As for those who get killed in the cause of God, He will never let their deeds be put to waste. |||
| 047:005 | He will guide them, and relieve their concerns.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |||
| 047:006 | And He will admit them into Paradise, which He has described to them.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |||
| 047:007 | O you who believe, if you support God, He will support you, and make your foothold firm.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |||
| 047:008 | And those who rejected, for them is destruction; and He has misled their works.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |||
| 047:009 | That is because they hated what God sent down, thus He nullifies their works.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |||
| 047:010 | Did they not roam the land and note how was the end for those before them? God destroyed them and the rejecters in a similar fate.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |||
| 047:011 | This is because God is the Master for those who believe, while the disbelievers have no master.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |||

|         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |||
| ------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |||
| 047:012 | God admits those who believe and do good works to paradises with rivers flowing beneath them. As for those who reject, they are enjoying and eating as the cattle eat, and the Fire will be their abode.                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |||
| 047:013 | And many a town was stronger than your own town, which drove you out. We destroyed them, and there was none who could help them.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |||
| 047:014 | Is one who is based on proof from his Lord, as one for whom his evil works have been adorned for him and they followed their desires?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |||
| 047:015 | Is the example of Paradise; that the righteous have been promised with rivers of pure water, and rivers of milk whose taste does not change, and rivers of wine that are delicious for the drinkers, and rivers of strained honey, and for them in it are all kinds of fruits, and a forgiveness from their Lord; like that of those who abide in the Fire, and are given to drink boiling water that cuts-up their intestines? |||
| 047:016 | And some of them listen to you, until when they go out from you, they say to those who have been given the knowledge: "What did he say?"
